name: Screaming & Farting: THE GAME
description:
THE HIT JOKE EVERYONE*'S BEEN TALKING ABOUT, NOW AVAILABLE FOR YOUR PC!!

Love screaming? Love farting? Love short streamers who laugh at both? Then SCREAMING & FARTING: THE GAME is for you!

FEATURES: - SIMULATION MODE

Scream and Fart to your heart's content in SIMULATION MODE! Press Q to Scream and W to Fart! Watch fireman bob up and down to the speed of your TURBO MODE!

- ADVENTURE MODE

Join the world's preferred  ACTUAL PSYCHOPATH as he journeys on a quest to EXTRACT TEARS from the masses through the powers of SCREAMING and FARTING!

- GAME ASSETS

The game is completely not encrypted! Take the files, copy them, edit them, REPLACE THEM. Want to edit in-game data? Go for it! It's all available (given you own a copy of RPG Maker VX Ace, at least for the game data)

- MUSIC BY THOMAS MOGENSEN

Famed composer of Sub Hunter (2008)!

HOW TO PLAY GAME:

1: DOWNLOAD FILE

2: OPEN BLUE APPLICATION FILE

3: EXTRACT GAME FOLDER

4: RUN THE "GAME" APPLICATION

5: ENJOY!

If there are any major issues with the game, please let me know on TWITER (.) COM https://twitter.com/locke_daddy! I'll fix them as soon as I can!

(also if there's anything you think I should add, lemme know, if I can make this any funnier I will)

*this joke was funny like a year ago, no one is talking about it now.
